footer.tagline: üåüYOUR DREAM STORE üí´üè¨ 60,000+ satisfied customers üî• Livraison 58 wilaya üá©üáø
footer.company_description: At FASTSHOP, we're passionate about bringing unique, unisex fashion to Algeria. Our curated collection of aesthetic and oversized clothing is perfect for those who love acuby, y2k, and vintage styles. We're committed to providing a seamless shopping experience with fast delivery and payment on delivery. We are your dream store with 60,000+ satisfied customers, delivering across 58 wilaya in Algeria.
footer.unique_styles_desc: Discover a curated collection of aesthetic, oversized, and vintage-inspired pieces.
footer.fast_delivery_desc: Get your order delivered to your doorstep super fast, anywhere in Algeria.
footer.easy_returns_desc: Enjoy hassle-free returns and exchanges within 7 days of receiving your order.
footer.pay_on_delivery_desc: For your convenience, we accept cash on delivery for all orders.
footer.payment_method_answer: Cash on delivery: Pay when you receive your order
footer.order_tracking_question: How do I track my order?
footer.order_tracking_answer: You can track your order from the office or delivery to home
footer.shipping_cost_answer: The price varies according to the state

about.intro_p1: üåüYOUR DREAM STORE üí´üè¨ Style delivered fast, dreams come true! Welcome to FASTSHOP, where 60,000+ customers trust us for the hottest aesthetic fashion in Algeria.
about.intro_p2: üåü60,000+ satisfied customers üî• Discover our curated selection of aesthetic, oversized clothing, perfect for acuby, y2k, and vintage enthusiasts.
about.intro_p3: üåüLivraison 58 wilaya üá©üáø With fast shipping, payment at delivery, and easy browsing, FASTSHOP makes it simple to elevate your style. We deliver across Algeria with payment on delivery for your convenience.
about.mission_p1: We believe in making fashion accessible to everyone with lightning-fast delivery and payment on delivery. Whether you're looking for aesthetic oversized pieces or vintage-inspired clothing, we're here to help you express your unique style with confidence.
about.mission_p2: Our mission is to provide high-quality, unique fashion pieces that help you look and feel your best, delivered right to your doorstep in Batna and across Algeria.
about.contact_questions: For any questions or support, contact us at:

refund_policy.title: Return or Exchange Policy
refund_policy.subtitle: You can return the product for a refund or exchange
refund_policy.policy_text: Every faulty product can be kept and returned in the same condition it was received in, unused and in its original packaging.
refund_policy.contact_info: We communicate with our customers via our Instagram account: fast_.shop1
refund_policy.process_info: After contacting us, we will explain how the return or exchange process will be, in addition to how it returns to Hilal.
